changeSet.author: claudiu-movie
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE movie( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, director VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, duration INT NOT NULL, release_year INT NOT NULL, average FLOAT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY(id) );

changeSet.author: claudiu-movie
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE rating( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, movieId BIGINT NOT NULL, userId BIGINT NOT NULL, ratingValue INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY(id), CONSTRAINT fk_rating_movie FOREIGN KEY (movieId) REFERENCES movie(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
